game.name: Eternal Dreams: Poker RPG
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A rogue AI and an alien virus trapped a billion players inside a dream-sim set on Midgard — your playground and your prison. Use Poker cards in this high-stakes roguelite RPG to shatter the illusion that threatens humanity from within. Every hand doesn't just change your fate; it rewrites reality.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A rogue AI and an alien virus trapped a billion players inside a dream-sim set on Midgard — your playground and your prison. Use Poker cards in this high-stakes roguelite RPG to shatter the illusion that threatens humanity from within. Every hand doesn't just change your fate; it rewrites reality.
